# alertlogic Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "alertlogic" {
  username   = var.username
  password   = var.password
  account_id = var.account_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **account_id** (String)
- **password** (String, Sensitive)
- **username** (String)
